attributes.action: The government should lift the ban on peaceful public protests.
attributes.additional_details: Protesting is a democratic right, this ban is totally against core British values. Criminalising protests is the first step on the path to dictatorship.
attributes.background: The government should lift the ban on peaceful public protests.

rejection.details:
The new Covid-19 regulations permit protests where these have been organised by a business, a charitable, benevolent or philanthropic institution, a public body or a political body, and the gathering organiser takes the required precautions in relation to the gathering: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2020/1374/pdfs/uksi_20201374_en.pdf

If you would like the Government to change the rules on the type of protests that are permitted we could accept a petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear what changes you want to be made.
